body:
I have come across the same issue with v3.1.2

Using the example data below:

```
        $data = array(
            array(
                'title' => 'My title' ,
                'name' => 'My Name 2' ,
                'date' => 'My date 2'
            ),
            array(
                'title' => 'Another title' ,
                'name' => 'Another Name 2' ,
                'date' => 'Another date 2'
            )
        );

        $this->db->update_batch('mytable', $data, 'title');
```

Produces the following incorrectly formed query

> UPDATE `mytable` SET `title` = CASE WHEN `title` = THEN 'My title' WHEN `title` = THEN 'Another title' ELSE `title` END, `name` = CASE WHEN `title` = THEN 'My Name 2' WHEN `title` = THEN 'Another Name 2' ELSE `name` END, `date` = CASE WHEN `title` = THEN 'My date 2' WHEN `title` = THEN 'Another date 2' ELSE `date` END WHERE `title` IN(,)

Prior to Fix #4871

> UPDATE `mytable` SET `name` = CASE WHEN `title` = 'My title' THEN 'My Name 2' WHEN `title` = 'Another title' THEN 'Another Name 2' ELSE `name` END, `date` = CASE WHEN `title` = 'My title' THEN 'My date 2' WHEN `title` = 'Another title' THEN 'Another date 2' ELSE `date` END WHERE `title` IN('My title','Another title')

I have found that replacing the `$index` argument back to `$this->protect_identifiers($index)` in the **update_batch** function in **DB_query_builder.php** on the following line will fix the creation of these batch update SQL statements. I am unsure if this will affect anything else? Can anyone else confirm this?

> if ($this->query($this->_update_batch($this->protect_identifiers($table, TRUE, NULL, FALSE), array_slice($this->qb_set, $i, $batch_size), $index))) 

https://github.com/bcit-ci/CodeIgniter/blob/84f5366a8d76fe935a57cb9dbf61c970d98a0a27/system/database/DB_query_builder.php#L1918
I have the same issue, please fix this as soon as possible

Same here, a fix is more than welcome.
I'll go back to 3.1.0 until this is solved.

issue.title: Fix #4892 caused by #4871,  use real index in CI_DB_query_builder::_update_batch

issue.title: $this->db->update_batch() not compatible with MySQL 5.7

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
Hi!

Before the update the $this->db->update_batch() was just working fine. Now it gives an error:

```
ERROR - 2016-12-08 10:48:46 --> Query error: You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near 'THEN '434'
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN '896'
ELSE `Contact_ID` END, `FirstName` = ' at line 2 - Invalid query: UPDATE `Emergency_Contacts` SET `Contact_ID` = CASE 
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN '434'
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN '896'
ELSE `Contact_ID` END, `FirstName` = CASE 
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN 'Big Mamma'
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN 'Big Pappa'
ELSE `FirstName` END, `LastName` = CASE 
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN 'Dog'
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN 'Doggie'
ELSE `LastName` END, `PhoneNumber` = CASE 
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN '78974945'
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN '7889456465'
ELSE `PhoneNumber` END, `Relation` = CASE 
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN 'mother'
WHEN `Contact_ID` =  THEN 'Father'
ELSE `Relation` END
WHERE `Contact_ID` IN(,)
```

My Code:

```
foreach($contacts->result() as $rowContact){				
		$tempContact = array(
		'Contact_ID' => $rowContact->Contact_ID,
		'FirstName' => $this->input->post('FirstName'.$rowContact->Contact_ID),
		'LastName' => $this->input->post('LastName'.$rowContact->Contact_ID),
		'PhoneNumber' => $this->input->post('PhoneNumber'.$rowContact->Contact_ID),
		'Relation' => $this->input->post('Relation'.$rowContact->Contact_ID)
	);
	
	array_push($contactDetails, $tempContact);				
}

if ($this->db->update_batch('Emergency_Contacts', $contactDetails, 'Contact_ID')) {
	return TRUE;
 } else {
	return FALSE;
}
```

issue.body:
Not sure what is going on with you guys but some serious basic issues with 3.1.2.
Earlier I reported Image_lib issues
Now problems with update_batch
Same code in 2.2.4 works but not in 3.1.2 after update and again has similar footprints with syntax i.e the error is You have an error in your SQL syntax; check the manual that corresponds to your MySQL server version for the right syntax to use near ... and so on. I am assuming again compiling the sql syntax issues
not sure if upgrading was any good thinking of reverting it back. Update should not least break the core functionality. Please don't go the apple or Mozilla route regarding updates
Please check

issue.title: Bug of _update_batch in system\core\databse\DB_query_builder.php in 3.1.2

repository.name: CodeIgniter
repository.description: Open Source PHP Framework (originally from EllisLab)

issue.body:
Version: 3.1.2 Download from https://www.codeigniter.com If using update_batch, you will get `

Severity: Notice

Message: Undefined index: id

Filename: database/DB_query_builder.php

Line Number: 1949

` Line 1944, index was escaped, but not used in Line 1949 `$ids[] = $val[$index];` So whatever you pass to this function, you will always get this error. It is OK in CI 3.0
